head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CASH, HAROLD C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CASH, HAROLD C.

block.p: CASH-Harold C. On Sept. 19, 2000. Born October 29, 1915 in Syracuse, NY. An Industrial Psychologist specializing in Marketing and Sales training. A graduate of Syracuse University with a Master's Degree from NYU. A former Marketing Professor at NYU. Beloved husband of Frances Elizabeth for 56 years. Loving father of James, Margaret, Mary and Sheila. Also survived by six grandchildren. Reposing Wednesday at Cassidy Funeral Home, 156 Willis Avenue, Mineola, L.I. Interment Friday, St. Columbkille Cemetery, Seneca Falls, New York. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Mineola Volunteer Ambulance Corps would be appreciated. Visiting hours Wednesday 2-5 and 7-9 PM.
